Title: Relates to the establishment of guardianship programs in the counties of Nassau and Suffolk
Summary: Directs the chief administrator of the courts to establish in Nassau and Suffolk counties, court ordered guardianship programs which shall facilitate the use of geriatric social workers, retired senior volunteers and/or other non-attorneys to serve as guardians appointed by a court under article 81 of the mental hygiene law, for incapacitated adults who lack financial resources and appropriate family supports.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to guardianship programs in the counties of Nassau and Suffolk
